text:
@GovernorPataki @NYGovCuomo @nypost I HOPE EVERYONE IS AWARE THAT CUOMO: 
❇️NEVER WEARS A MASK
❇️GOT A HAIRCUT WHEN OTHERS COULDN’T
❇️TOLD PEOPLE WHO ARE OUT OF WORK & NEED TO FEED THEIR FAMILIES TO GO GET AN ESSENTIAL JOB!!
❇️HE USED TAXPAYER 💰ON ILLEGALS 
❇️MANDATED COVID-19 INFECTED PEOPLE INFECT NURSING HOMES!
